Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • Movable
        • Player

  • public class Player
extends Movable
    Player.java, stores all data ascociated with the player. Subclass of Movable.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Ewan Bradford, Luke Francis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String sprite)
        Creates a new player from a position and image file.
        Parameters:
        x, - the x coordinate of the player.
        y, - the y coordinate of the player.
        sprite, - the filepath of the image for the player.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update(Board board,
                  int keyboardIn)
        Updates the player's position in response to the keyboard input, if move is allowed.
        Parameters:
        board, - the board object for the player to be "placed" in.
        keyboardIn, - the current keypress.
        Returns:
        Returns a code, 0-player could no perform move, 1 successfully moved, 2-player is dead.

      • removeKey

        public boolean removeKey(java.lang.String keyColour)
        Removes one key if the player owns one.
        Parameters:
        keyColour, - the colour of the key to be removed.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a key was present and removed, false if player did not have a key to remove.

      • addKey

        public void addKey(java.lang.String keyColour)
        Adds a key to the players keys.
        Parameters:
        keyColour, - the colour of the key to add. (red, blue, yellow or green)

      • addToken

        public void addToken(int tokens)
        Adds tokens to the player.
        Parameters:
        tokens, - the number of tokens to be added.

      • getTokens

        public int getTokens()
        Returns:
        Returns the current number of tokens the player has.

      • addBoots

        public void addBoots()
        Gives the player boots

      • getBoots

        public boolean getBoots()
        Returns:
        Returns if the player has boot equipped.

      • addFlippers

        public void addFlippers()
        Gives the player flippers.

      • getFlippers

        public boolean getFlippers()
        Returns:
        Returns if the player has flipper quippped.
